sections.title: What is Islamic Finance?
sections.content: Islamic finance refers to financial activities that comply with Islamic law (Shariah) and principles.

sections.title: How Does the GPT Assistant Work?
sections.content: Our GPT assistant uses artificial intelligence to provide expert guidance on Islamic finance products and services.

questions.question: What is the difference between Islamic finance and conventional finance?
questions.answer: Islamic finance is based on Islamic law and principles, whereas conventional finance is based on interest and speculation.
